tasks.task: Assembling and filling a garden tower
subtasks: Check if enough soil is available
Fill the tower about a third of the way with soil
Add approximately three gallons of water to the soil
Rotate the tower to ensure even water distribution
Prepare strawberry plants (repurposing feed bags for topsoil and planting)
Plant strawberries in the tower (white and red varieties)
Fill the tower with remaining soil
Allow the tower to settle before adding more plants

tasks.task: Setting up the garden tower for food scraps
subtasks: Position the tower near the kitchen for easy access
Create a system for adding food scraps to the tower
Research the upgrade kit for coaster or wheels
Decide whether to add coaster/wheels based on current setup
Promote the The Garden Tower Project on farmerbride.com
